titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for "Sonification of Pressure Changes in Swimming for Analysis and Optimization"

mods.abstract:
### Sonification Examples Details on the sonification are provided in the ICAD paper.
#### Standard Oscillator bank mapping + Sound Example S1a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695529" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S1b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695528" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S1c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695530" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S1d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695531" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S1e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695532" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
#### Excitatory Oscillator mapping + Sound Example S2a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695533" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S2b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695534" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S2c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695535" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S2d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695536" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S2e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695537" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
#### Single-Stream Multi-Parameter Mapping + Sound Example S3a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695538" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S3b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695539" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S3c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695540" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S3d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695541" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S3e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695542" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
#### Harmonic Series mapping + Sound Example S4a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695543" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S4b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695544" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S4c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695545" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S4d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695546" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S4e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695547" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
#### Event-based Mapping + Sound Example S5a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695548" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S5b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695549" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S5c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695550" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S5d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695551" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S5e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695552" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
#### Task-specific mapping optimizations + Sound Example S6a: slow speed <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695553" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S6b: somewhat faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695555" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S6c: faster <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695554" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S6d: sprint <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695556" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
+ Sound Example S6e: 3x-zoom slow motion <center><audio controls="controls" width="80%" height="80%"> <source src="https://pub.uni-bielefeld.de/download/2695526/2695557" type="audio/mp3" /> </audio></center>
